content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-06-11 #25719 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
hmm, the adaptation script seems to be done something wrong... I think because my remotes have been renamed in preparation for the CI changeover.
What should we do here? Hard-code a convention? Or try to lookup the available remotes and filter out the correct one? I guess the latter is possible?
I think you can just use direct URLs instead of remotes in most places? Haven't looked at the script.
I did this one by hand in #25805
I hope #25806 fixes the script. (I tested it while creating #25805.)
Ouch... that means I did a really bad job interpreting the merge conflicts.
Let's nuke this one, and run the script again?
